privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our top priority
privacy.noTrackingDesc: We do not use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or any third-party tracking services. Your activity stays private.
privacy.noCookiesDesc: We never set cookies. All data stays on your device using encrypted localStorage.
privacy.secureNetworkDesc: All requests are validated against an allowlist. Only trusted domains are permitted.
privacy.localDataDesc: Your data never leaves your device. Posts, preferences, and wallet info stay local and encrypted.
privacy.web3NoticeDesc: Connecting a wallet exposes your blockchain address. Your Student ID stays anonymous.
privacy.commitment: We are committed to protecting your privacy and staying transparent about our practices.
privacy.opensource: SafeVoice is open source. Audit our code any time.

fingerprint.title: Browser Fingerprint Protection
fingerprint.description: Monitor and protect against browser fingerprinting techniques used by trackers to identify you across websites.
fingerprint.detectionDesc: Monitor browser fingerprinting signals and track your privacy risk score.
fingerprint.mitigationDesc: Automatically apply countermeasures when high-risk fingerprinting is detected.
fingerprint.saltRotationDesc: Rotate the anonymization salt to refresh your fingerprint signature.

hub.title: Privacy Education Hub

tracking.title: How Tracking Works
tracking.description: Understand how websites and advertisers track your online activity across the internet

fingerprinting.title: Browser Fingerprinting
fingerprinting.description: Learn how trackers use your browser characteristics to identify you without cookies

dataFlow.title: Your Data Flow
dataFlow.description: See exactly where your data goes and how SafeVoice keeps it local and secure

protection.title: Our Protection Layers
protection.description: Discover the multiple security layers that protect your privacy

whatIsTracking.a: Online tracking is when companies follow your internet activity across websites to build a profile about your interests and behavior.

howProtected.q: How is my data protected on SafeVoice?
howProtected.a: We use end-to-end encryption, local storage only, strict domain whitelisting, and advanced fingerprint protection to keep your data secure.

canIBeAnonymous.a: Yes, SafeVoice assigns you a cryptographically verified anonymous identity. You can post and engage without revealing your real identity.

whatIsFingerprinting.a: Browser fingerprinting is a tracking technique that collects information about your browser and device to create a unique identifier.

cookiesUsed.a: No, we are 100% cookie-free. All data is stored locally on your device using encrypted localStorage.

dataSharing.q: Do you share my data with third parties?
dataSharing.a: Never. Your data stays on your device. We have strict security headers and network policies preventing unauthorized access.

welcome.title: Welcome to SafeVoice
welcome.description: Your privacy-first platform for anonymous expression and community support

whyPrivacy.title: Why Privacy Matters
whyPrivacy.description: In today's digital world, your data is more valuable than ever. We believe you deserve control over your information.

ourApproach.title: Our Privacy Approach
ourApproach.description: We don't track, profile, or monetize your data. Everything stays encrypted and local to your device.

protections.title: Built-in Protections
protections.description: Enable fingerprint protection, manage your security settings, and stay in control of your privacy.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Explore SafeVoice with confidence. Visit our Privacy Settings to learn more and adjust your preferences.
